title: Jennifer Garner enjoys a day out with son Samuel following Ben Affleck's sobriety setback
text:
Jennifer Garner seemed in good spirits as she enjoyed a day out with her son Samuel on Tuesday.

The actress, 47, strolled alongside her youngest child, seven, as she dropped him off at a swimming class in Santa Monica, following the news that Ben Affleck suffered a sobriety setback.

The Peppermint star brushed aside the controversy as she continued to be a doting mother to the children she shares with her ex-husband.

Doting mum: Jennifer Garner enjoyed a day out with her son Samuel on Tuesday. The actress, 47, strolled alongside her youngest child, seven, as she dropped him off at a swimming class

Jennifer kept things low-key for the outing in a pair of dungarees and trainers as she strolled past chatting away on the phone.

Meanwhile, Samuel was already dressed for his swimming class in trunks, and carrying a backpack that was nearly as large as the youngster.

Jennifer's outing came as ex Ben discussed breaking his sobriety, reasoning: 'Well you know it happens, it's a slip but I'm not going to let it derail me'.

Low-key: Across town, Jennifer's ex Ben Affleck was strolling through West Hollywood after suffering a 'sobriety setback' whilst leaving a Halloween party in Los Angeles

The Gone Girl star first became sober in the Nineties, stating that alcohol was 'dangerous' for him.

On Saturday night, the star suffered a 'sobriety setback' after leaving a Halloween party in Los Angeles.

Ben wrapped his arms around a mystery woman while the pair waited for a ride outside of the La Peer Hotel, which played host to the Unicef Masquerade ball.

He wore a white skeleton mask and a black suit and 'seemed to have fallen off the wagon' after he 'nearly fell before catching himself on the vehicle,' according to TMZ.

Ben has been candid about his struggle with alcoholism, entering rehab for the third time in 2018, after Jennifer intervened and drove him to a facility.

Jennifer has been supportive of her ex's struggles to get sober, and they are often seen together as they continue to amicably co-parent their children, Violet, 13, and Seraphina, 10.

The couple began dating 2004 after meeting on the sets of Pearl Harbor and Daredevil and married a year later, but announced their split in 2015.

Ben has been dating on and off since the split, with model Shauna Sexton, Saturday Night Live producer Lindsay Shookus and most recently musician Katie Cherry, who Affleck was seen with at the masquerade party.

Meanwhile, Jennifer has been dating businessman John Miller for nearly a year.
description: The actress, 47, strolled alongside her youngest child, seven, as she dropped him off at a swimming class in Santa Monica, following the news that Ben Affleck suffered a sobriety setback.
